title: The Garden, the Curtain and the Cross: The true story of why Jesus died and rose again
description: This picture book takes children on a journey from the garden of Eden to God's prefect new creation.  Retelling the Easter story through a Bible overview, children will discover that 'because of our sin, we can't go in' but because of Jesus' victory on the cross, an even better garden awaits us...
author: Carl Laferton
